verses.verse: Finally <S%G3063><s%>, <S%G3450>my<s%> <S%G80>brethren<s%>, <S%G5463>rejoice<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> the <S%G2962>Lord<s%>. for <S%G1063><s%> <S%G2249>we<s%> <S%G2070>are<s%> the <S%G4061>circumcision<s%>, who <S%G3000>worship<s%> by the <S%G4151>Spirit<s%> of <S%G2316>God<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G2744>glory<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> <S%G5547>Christ<s%> <S%G2424>Jesus<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G3982>have<s%> <S%G3756>no<s%> <S%G3982>confidence<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> the <S%G4561>flesh<s%>:

though <S%G2539><s%> <S%G1473>I<s%> myself might2192, 2532 <S%G2192>have<s%> <S%G4006>confidence<s%> even <S%G1722>in<s%> the <S%G4561>flesh<s%>: <S%G1487>if<s%> <S%G5100>any<s%> <S%G243>other<s%> <S%G5100>man<s%> <S%G1380>thinketh<s%> to have <S%G3982>confidence<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> the <S%G4561>flesh<s%>, <S%G1473>I<s%> yet <S%G3123>more<s%>:

circumcised <S%G4061><s%> the <S%G3637>eighth<s%> <S%G1537>day<s%>, of the <S%G1085>stock<s%> of <S%G2474>Israel<s%>, of the <S%G5443>tribe<s%> <S%G1537>of<s%> <S%G958>Benjamin<s%>, a <S%G1445>Hebrew<s%> of <S%G1445>Hebrews<s%>; as <S%G2596>touching<s%> the <S%G3551>law<s%>, a <S%G5330>Pharisee<s%>;

as <S%G2596>touching<s%> <S%G2205>zeal<s%>, <S%G1377>persecuting<s%> the <S%G1577>church<s%>; as <S%G2596>touching<s%> the <S%G1343>righteousness<s%> <S%G3588>which<s%> <S%G1096>is<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> the <S%G3551>law<s%>, found <S%G273>blameless<s%>.

Howbeit <S%G235><s%> what <S%G3748>things<s%> <S%G2258>were<s%> <S%G2771>gain<s%> to <S%G3427>me<s%>, <S%G5023>these<s%> have I <S%G2233>counted<s%> <S%G2209>loss<s%> <S%G1223>for<s%> <S%G5547>Christ<s%>.

Yea <S%G235><s%> <S%G3304>verily<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> I <S%G2233>count<s%> all <S%G3956>things<s%> to <S%G1511>be<s%> <S%G2209>loss<s%> <S%G1223>for<s%> the <S%G5242>excellency<s%> of the <S%G1108>knowledge<s%> of <S%G5547>Christ<s%> <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> <S%G3450>my<s%> <S%G2962>Lord<s%>: <S%G1223>for<s%> <S%G3739>whom<s%> I suffered the loss <S%G2210>of<s%> all <S%G3956>things<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> do <S%G2233>count<s%> them but <S%G4657>refuse<s%>, <S%G2443>that<s%> <S%G1511>I<s%> may <S%G2770>gain<s%> <S%G5547>Christ<s%>,

and <S%G2532><s%> be <S%G2147>found<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> <S%G846>him<s%>, <S%G3361>not<s%> <S%G2192>having<s%> a <S%G1343>righteousness<s%> <S%G1537>of<s%> mine <S%G1699>own<s%>, even that which <S%G3588>is<s%> <S%G1537>of<s%> the <S%G3551>law<s%>, <S%G235>but<s%> that which <S%G3588>is<s%> <S%G1223>through<s%> <S%G4102>faith<s%> in <S%G5547>Christ<s%>, the <S%G1343>righteousness<s%> which <S%G3588>is<s%> from <S%G2316>God<s%> <S%G1909>by<s%> <S%G4102>faith<s%>:

that <S%G3588><s%> I may <S%G1097>know<s%> <S%G846>him<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> the <S%G1411>power<s%> <S%G386>of<s%> <S%G846>his<s%> <S%G386>resurrection<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> the <S%G2842>fellowship<s%> <S%G3804>of<s%> <S%G846>his<s%> <S%G3804>sufferings<s%>, becoming conformed <S%G4833>unto<s%> <S%G846>his<s%> <S%G2288>death<s%>;
if <S%G1487><s%> by any <S%G4459>means<s%> I may <S%G2658>attain<s%> <S%G1519>unto<s%> the <S%G1815>resurrection<s%> from the <S%G3498>dead<s%>.

Not <S%G3756><s%> <S%G3754>that<s%> I <S%G2983>have<s%> <S%G2235>already<s%> <S%G2983>obtained<s%>, <S%G2228>or<s%> <S%G5048>am<s%> <S%G2235>already<s%> made <S%G5048>perfect<s%>: <S%G1161>but<s%> I press <S%G1377>on<s%>, <S%G1487>if<s%> so be <S%G2532>that<s%> I may lay <S%G2638>hold<s%> on that <S%G1909>for<s%> <S%G3739>which<s%> <S%G2532>also<s%> I was laid <S%G2638>hold<s%> on <S%G5259>by<s%> <S%G5547>Christ<s%> <S%G2424>Jesus<s%>.

Brethren <S%G80><s%>, <S%G1473>I<s%> <S%G3049>count<s%> <S%G3756>not<s%> <S%G1683>myself<s%> yet to have laid <S%G2638>hold<s%>: <S%G1161>but<s%> one <S%G1520>thing<s%> I <S%G1950>do<s%>, forgetting the <S%G3303>things<s%> which <S%G3588>are<s%> <S%G3694>behind<s%>, <S%G1161>and<s%> stretching <S%G1901>forward<s%> to the things which <S%G3588>are<s%> <S%G1715>before<s%>,

I <S%G1377>press<s%> on <S%G2596>toward<s%> the <S%G4649>goal<s%> <S%G1909>unto<s%> the <S%G1017>prize<s%> of <S%G2821>the<s%> <S%G507>high<s%> <S%G2821>calling<s%> of <S%G2316>God<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> <S%G5547>Christ<s%> <S%G2424>Jesus<s%>.

Let <S%G5426>us<s%> <S%G3767>therefore<s%>, as many <S%G3745>as<s%> are <S%G5046>perfect<s%>, be <S%G5124>thus<s%> <S%G5426>minded<s%>: <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G1487>if<s%> in <S%G5100>anything<s%> ye <S%G5426>are<s%> <S%G2088>otherwise<s%> <S%G5426>minded<s%>, <S%G5124>this<s%> also shall <S%G2316>God<s%> reveal601, 2532 unto <S%G5213>you<s%>:
only <S%G4133><s%>, <S%G3739><s%> <S%G1519>whereunto<s%> we have <S%G5348>attained<s%>, by <S%G2583>that<s%> <S%G846>same<s%> <S%G2583>rule<s%> let us846, 5426 <S%G4748>walk<s%>.

Brethren <S%G80><s%>, <S%G1096>be<s%> ye imitators <S%G4831>together<s%> of <S%G3450>me<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G4648>mark<s%> them that so <S%G4043>walk<s%> even <S%G3779>as<s%> ye <S%G2192>have<s%> <S%G2248>us<s%> <S%G2531>for<s%> an <S%G5179>ensample<s%>.

For <S%G1063><s%> <S%G4183>many<s%> <S%G4043>walk<s%>, of <S%G3739>whom<s%> I <S%G3004>told<s%> <S%G5213>you<s%> <S%G4178>often<s%>, <S%G1161>and<s%> <S%G3568>now<s%> tell <S%G3004>you<s%> <S%G2532>even<s%> <S%G2799>weeping<s%>, that they are the <S%G2190>enemies<s%> of the <S%G4716>cross<s%> of <S%G5547>Christ<s%>:

whose <S%G3739><s%> <S%G5056>end<s%> is <S%G684>perdition<s%>, <S%G3739>whose<s%> <S%G2316>god<s%> is the <S%G2836>belly<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> whose <S%G1391>glory<s%> is <S%G1722>in<s%> <S%G846>their<s%> <S%G152>shame<s%>, <S%G3588>who<s%> <S%G5426>mind<s%> earthly <S%G1919>things<s%>.

who <S%G3739><s%> shall <S%G3345>fashion<s%> anew the <S%G4983>body<s%> of <S%G2257>our<s%> <S%G5014>humiliation<s%>, <S%G1519>that<s%> <S%G846>it<s%> may <S%G1096>be<s%> conformed <S%G4832>to<s%> the <S%G4983>body<s%> of <S%G846>his<s%> <S%G1391>glory<s%>, according <S%G2596>to<s%> the <S%G1753>working<s%> <S%G3588>whereby<s%> <S%G846>he<s%> is <S%G1410>able<s%> <S%G2532>even<s%> to <S%G5293>subject<s%> all <S%G3956>things<s%> unto <S%G1438>himself<s%>.
